import React from 'react'; function CustomerProfile(props) { const [editname, seteditname] = React.useState(false) const [editemail, seteditemail] = React.useState(false) const [editnumber, seteditnumber] = React.useState(false) const [editdob, seteditdob] = React.useState(false) const [editpassword, seteditpassword] = React.useState(false) const [editgender, seteditgender] = React.useState(false) const [name, setname] = React.useState(props.name) const [email, setemail] = React.useState(props.email) const [number, setnumber] = React.useState(props.number) const [dob, setdob] = React.useState(props.dob) const [password, setpassword] = React.useState(props.password) const [gender, setgender] = React.useState(props.gender) return (
{name}
Name seteditname(true)}/> {editname === false?
{name}
:
setname(e.target.value)}/>
}
Email seteditemail(true)}/> {editemail === false?
{email}
:
setemail(e.target.value)}/>
}
Phone Number seteditnumber(true)}/> {editnumber === false?
{number}
:
setnumber(e.target.value)}/>
}
Date of Birth seteditdob(true)}/> {editdob === false?
{dob}
:
setdob(e.target.value)}/>
}
Password seteditpassword(true)}/> {editpassword === false?
**********
:
setpassword(e.target.value)}/>
}
Gender seteditgender(true)}/> {editgender === false?
{gender}
:
setgender(e.target.value)}/>
}
); } export default CustomerProfile;
